A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Poorly written\, too much poor humor ruined the feel of the movie and some characters. Characters were changed and not for the better\, the plot was pointless. It tried too hard to be funny and innovative and it failed. While it had many entertaining scenes and some fantastic visuals\, the cons outweigh the pros with this movie. I rank it on the same level as Attack of the Clones. This movie was very disappointing.
